feedback.aiSummary: The speaker provided a very brief greeting. It's difficult to assess much from such a short utterance.
feedback.constructiveTip: To make a stronger impact, consider expanding on your introduction with more context or a specific opening. Even a simple follow-up sentence can drastically improve engagement and clarity.
improvements: Add more content to the speech.
Introduce a clear topic or purpose.
Work on varying your tone and pace.
